example.eg: We were supposed to meet for tea at 5 o'clock, but she didn't show up.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 出现，露面, 暴露，显露, 使…难堪，给…丢脸

example.eg: Sometimes a tumor does not show up on an x-ray.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 显现出来, 让人看见

example.eg: This picture really shows up Caroline's beautiful features.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 使显现出来, 使突显

example.eg: Joan's husband got drunk and showed her up in front of the other guests.
This is my sister's first time playing tennis and she's beating me; she is really showing me up.
